Fellowship of the Ring (3018-3019 TA).summary: The journey of the Nine Walkers from Rivendell to the breaking of the Fellowship, forming the core of the struggle against Sauron.
Fellowship of the Ring (3018-3019 TA).outcome: The Fellowship is broken but its members continue the fight on different fronts.

Fellowship of the Ring.summary: The formation and travels of the Fellowship to aid Frodo in bearing the One Ring towards Mordor.
Fellowship of the Ring.outcome: The Fellowship's actions allow the Ring-bearer to advance toward Mount Doom.

Quest of Mount Doom.summary: Frodo and Sam's journey through Mordor to cast the One Ring into the fires of Orodruin.
Quest of Mount Doom.outcome: The One Ring is destroyed and Sauron is overthrown.

Quest of Erebor 2941 TA.summary: Bilbo's adventure with Thorin and his company to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from Smaug.
Quest of Erebor 2941 TA.outcome: Smaug is slain and Erebor is reclaimed, leading to the Battle of Five Armies.

Battle with the Balrog.summary: Gandalf's confrontation with Durin's Bane in Moria, leading to his death and return as Gandalf the White.
Battle with the Balrog.outcome: The Balrog is slain and Gandalf is sent back with greater authority.

March of the Ents.summary: The Ents of Fangorn, led by Treebeard, march on Isengard in response to Saruman's depredations.
March of the Ents.outcome: Isengard is destroyed as a power of Saruman and he is effectively neutralized.

Darkening of Valinor.summary: Morgoth and Ungoliant destroy the Two Trees of Valinor, plunging the Blessed Realm into darkness.
Darkening of Valinor.outcome: The light of the Trees is lost; the Silmarils become the chief preserved light of the Trees.

Wars of Beleriand.summary: A series of great battles between Morgoth and the Elves and their allies in Beleriand.
Wars of Beleriand.outcome: Most of Beleriand is ruined, setting the stage for the War of Wrath.

Destruction of Erebor.summary: Smaug attacks the Lonely Mountain, driving out the Dwarves and laying waste to Dale.
Destruction of Erebor.outcome: Thorin's line becomes exiled and Erebor remains under Smaug's control until the Quest of Erebor.
